text: RT @TheRealBuzz When Neil took this pic of me it was very spontaneous. He said "stop right there" & I turned. You can see the motion of the strap #Apollo11 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DFNyDTlU0AASdeZ.jpg

“Our first child, Jacob, was born with Down syndrome…” http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DFWek4TU0AEXCay.jpg

Glad Billy’s doing well — I’m fighting for kids like him.
https://twitter.com/jimmykimmel/status/888499466138918912 QT @jimmykimmel Billy is 3 months old & doing great. Thx for the love & support. Please remind your Congresspeople that every kid deserves the care he got http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DFSU3nIUQAA8Gkb.jpg

RT @YWCAUSA Yes. Women in the criminal justice system and who are incarcerated, disproportionally WOC, are often survivors of violence and abuse. https://twitter.com/kamalaharris/status/888234834665111553
Stay focused. Health care for 22+ million is still at stake. Keep the calls up: (202) 224-3121.

No Republican or Democrat knows what will be in the "health care" bill they'll vote on Tuesday. How crazy, insulting & undemocratic is that? https://twitter.com/chicagotribune/status/888557069615472640 QT @chicagotribune Upcoming Obamacare vote in the Senate short on details: "I don't even know what we're proceeding to next week" http://trib.in/2uJ1qGJ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DFTJ22KXoAMoxRa.jpg

A key part of how we fix our criminal justice system is through establishing programs that treat trauma, mental illness & substance abuse. https://twitter.com/sdut/status/888745462500655104 QT @sdut County to start pilot program for people in jail with mental illness http://sdut.us/2vKTDow http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DFV1SUyXUAARFEQ.jpg
This weekend is critical for the health care fight. We must keep up the intense pressure. Keep calling. Keep writing. This isn’t over.

A majority of Americans oppose the GOP’s catastrophic health care bills. Time for the GOP to give up this fight. 
http://www.nbcnews.com/politics/congress/confusion-grips-senate-gop-ahead-expected-health-care-vote-n785066
#NetNeutrality is so vital to innovation, free speech, and consumer protection. We must maintain a free and open internet.
